SELECT t.maintenance_record maintenanceRecord, t2.NAME deviceName, d1.item_text malfunctionTypeName, t.replace_number replaceNumber, t3.depart_name orgName, t.maintain_time maintainTime, t4.realname userName, t1.materials_code materialsCode, t5.`name` materialsName, t1.replace_subassembly_code replaceSubassemblyCode, t1.subassembly_code subassemblyCode FROM spare_part_malfunction t RIGHT JOIN spare_part_replace t1 ON t.maintenance_record = t1.maintenance_record AND t.out_order_id = t.out_order_id LEFT JOIN device t2 ON t2.`code` = t.malfunction_device_code LEFT JOIN sys_dict AS dict1 ON dict1.dict_code = 'malfunction_type' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item AS d1 ON d1.item_value = t.malfunction_type AND dict1.id = d1.dict_id LEFT JOIN sys_depart t3 ON t3.id = t.org_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t4.id = t.maintain_user_id LEFT JOIN material_base t5 ON t5.`code` = t1.materials_code WHERE t.del_flag =0
and t.maintainTimeEnd between #{malfunction.maintainTimeBegin} and #{malfunction.maintainTimeEnd}
and t.id in(
#{item} )
order by t.create_time desc
